plot: In a dead end job and facing an uncertain future, Robert tries change for the sake of change. With the help of his high flying house-mates he transforms his life not discovering that in the end maybe all he needed was a little space.
title: Finctional
plot_es: In a dead end job and facing an uncertain future, Robert tries change for the sake of change. With the help of his high flying house-mates he transforms his life not discovering that in the end maybe all he needed was a little space.
